name: Dinocat Farm
description:
A ferocious simulations where you raise ferocious dinosaurs!

Instructions: 

  1. Click on the inventory bag icon on the bottom right corner
  2. Click on the egg icon to obtain your very first egg!
  3. Place it down within the fence area to hatch your first dinosaur
  4. Feed it to keep it alive and happy
  5. You can hatch however many dinosaurs you want but remember, it gets crazy when you have too much!
  6. 6 ferocious breeds to collect, how many have you got? ;)
